Class DefaultComponentRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.streamthoughts.azkarra.runtime.components.DefaultComponentRegistry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class DefaultComponentRegistry
extends Object
implements ComponentRegistry

      • findLatestDescriptorByAlias

        public <T> Optional<ComponentDescriptor<T>> findLatestDescriptorByAlias​(String alias)
        Finds a ComponentDescriptor for the specified class or alias. If more than one component is registered for the given alias, the latest version is returned.
        Specified by:
        findLatestDescriptorByAlias in interface ComponentRegistry
        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:
